import React, {useState} from 'react' const Match = props => { const [score1, setScore1] = useState(0); const handleClick = (val, team) => e => { e.preventDefault(); if(team==="teamA"){ if(val==="+1"){ setScore1(score1=> score1 + 1) } else setScore1(score1 => score1 + 3) } } return (

Team A: Dhirendra

Score: 20

Team B: Vikas

Score: 20
) } export default Match;
